Package pacman.ghost

Class Ghost

  • Object
    • Entity
      • Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Moveable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blinky, Clyde, Inky, Pinky
    public abstract class Ghost
extends Entity
    An Abstract Ghost which is a game entity.
    Implement this for Assignment 1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Ghost()
      Creates a ghost which is alive and starts in the SCATTER phase with a duration of Phase.SCATTER.duration().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      Gets the ghosts colour.

      Get the phase that the ghost currently is in.

      Gets the ghosts type.

      Checks if this ghost is dead.

      Kills this ghost by setting its status to isDead.
      String phaseInfo()
      Gets the phase info of the ghost.
      void reset()
      Resets the ghost back to an initial state where: It is alive With a Phase of SCATTER with duration SCATTER.getDuration() Facing in the Direction.UP With a Position of ( 0, 0 )
      void setPhase​(Phase newPhase, int duration)
      Sets the Ghost Phase and its duration overriding any current phase information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ghost

        public Ghost()
        Creates a ghost which is alive and starts in the SCATTER phase with a duration of Phase.SCATTER.duration(). This ghost also has a default position of (0, 0) and a default direction of facing up.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

    • Method Detail

      • setPhase

        public void setPhase​(Phase newPhase,
                     int duration)
        Sets the Ghost Phase and its duration overriding any current phase information. if Phase is null then no changes are made. If the duration is less than zero then the duration is set to 0.
        Parameters:
        newPhase - to set the ghost to.
        duration - of ticks for the phase to last for.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • getPhase

        public Phase getPhase()
        Get the phase that the ghost currently is in.
        Returns:
        the set phase.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • phaseInfo

        public String phaseInfo()
        Gets the phase info of the ghost.
        Returns:
        the phase and duration formatted as such: "PHASE:DURATION".
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • getColour

        public abstract String getColour()
        Gets the ghosts colour.
        Returns:
        hex version of the ghosts colour, e.g. #FFFFFF for white.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • getType

        public abstract GhostType getType()
        Gets the ghosts type.
        Returns:
        this ghosts type.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Kills this ghost by setting its status to isDead.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Checks if this ghost is dead.
        Returns:
        true if dead, false otherwise.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the ghost back to an initial state where:
        • It is alive
        • With a Phase of SCATTER with duration SCATTER.getDuration()
        • Facing in the Direction.UP
        • With a Position of ( 0, 0 )
        Implement this for Assignment 1
